analysis.description:
OysterPearl (/unique_chucks/1/0x1844b21593262668b7248d0f57a220caaba46ab9.sol#5-451) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/1/0x1844b21593262668b7248d0f57a220caaba46ab9.sol#355-357)

OysterPearl.claim (/unique_chucks/1/0x1844b21593262668b7248d0f57a220caaba46ab9.sol#232-282) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(claimed[msg.sender] == 1 || (block.timestamp - claimed[msg.sender]) >= epoch)

OysterPearl.claim (/unique_chucks/1/0x1844b21593262668b7248d0f57a220caaba46ab9.sol#232-282) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(claimed[msg.sender] == 1 || (block.timestamp - claimed[msg.sender]) >= epoch) (/unique_chucks/1/0x1844b21593262668b7248d0f57a220caaba46ab9.sol#247-250)
tokenRecipient.receiveApproval (/unique_chucks/1/0x1844b21593262668b7248d0f57a220caaba46ab9.sol#3) should be declared external
